alert.note: Alert for Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 1:32AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Prowers County through 215 AM MDT... At 131 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lamar, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph...half inch hail and torrential rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lamar. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
